kv21.4:5.1: Atthi adhippāyaiddhi buddhānaṃ vā sāvakānaṃ vāti?

kv21.4:10.4: Nanu āyasmā pilindavaccho rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa pāsādaṃ “suvaṇṇan”tveva adhimucci, suvaṇṇo ca pana āsīti?
kv21.4:10.6: Hañci āyasmā pilindavaccho rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa pāsādaṃ “suvaṇṇan”tveva adhimucci, suvaṇṇo ca pana āsi, tena vata re vattabbe—
